title: Evaluation of analytical greenness metric for an eco-friendly method developed through the integration of green chemistry and quality-by-design for the simultaneous determination of Nebivolol hydrochloride, Telmisartan, Valsartan, and Amlodipine besylate
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Y.V.S. Veerendra, Pradeep Kumar Brahman, Sharad D. Mankumare, Jayaraju Ch, Vinod Kumar C
